item.title: Anonymous (not verified): Comment 1
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous (not verified)
item.description:
hi

i'd be grateful if you upload .zip (not .rar or .exe) format of files because i can't download .exe and .rar files

tnx

item.title: arma: Comment 2
item.dcterms:creator: arma
item.description:
As a workaround for now, you can mail gettor@torproject.org from your gmail account, with the word

tor-im-browser-bundle

in your mail. Then you'll get a .z file in your mailbox, which you can download and unzip.

item.title: Ben Tremblay (not verified): Comment 3
item.dcterms:creator: Ben Tremblay (not verified)
item.description:
There's some concern regarding the size of the bundle; "It's too big for folk inside to DL".

Someone is working on integrating an alternative Jabber client.
Is that a consideration?

item.title: monika (not verified): Comment 4
item.dcterms:creator: monika (not verified)
item.description: is there Tor for Mac? If so, where?

item.title: phobos: Comment 5
item.dcterms:creator: phobos
item.description: Yes, it's right there on the download page, https://www.torproject.org/easy-download.html.en
